statements: UPDATE user_information SET email='new.email@example.com', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_information SET phone_number='0987654321', email='updated.email@example.com' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_information SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_information SET phone_number = '555-555-5555', email = 'anotheremail@example.com' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value='dark_mode' WHERE user_id=2 AND preference_name='theme';
UPDATE users SET age = 35, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'Dark Mode' WHERE user_id = 103 AND preference_name = 'theme'
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_type = 'Running', duration_minutes = 45 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET full_name='John Doe', age=35 WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preferred_category='Technology', subscription_status=true WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value='dark' WHERE user_id=2 AND preference_key='theme';
UPDATE users SET email='test@example.com', username='JohnDoe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age=30, full_name='Jane Doe' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id=100
UPDATE messages SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id=50
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_preferences SET marketing_emails = TRUE, marketing_sms = FALSE WHERE user_id = 456
